ygData.subject: Bard armour
ygData.msgSnippet: Well it s mostly armour I think.  As a lowly wood elf who is somewhat weak, I m finding it more and more difficult to cope with all the armour and weapons I
ygData.messageBody:
Well it's mostly armour I think. As a lowly wood elf who is somewhat
weak, I'm finding it more and more difficult to cope with all the
armour and weapons I carry, and still be able to pick up some loot.

My str is somewhere around 80 (memory failure!). And before I even
set out to hunt I'm carrying all but 10 of it. Now ok, I'm kitted out
in some fairly decent armour, mostly banded and ringmail, and a piece
of bronze, so I'm well protected. But it's rather heavy!

So anyway, are there any suggestions about the type of armour I can
get that will be lighter? Looking for cheap alternatives, or
somewhere to go murder things and steal their armour. I can even go
out and deal with (most) wisps as a steady source of income if cheap
isn't possible ;-)

Thanks all

--

Saldara
High Elf Wizard (20), Mith Marr server

Melaniel
Wood Elf Bard (11), Mith Marr server
